featured.text: Some documents noted that Russians “indulge in excessive drinking whenever the occasion arises,” while others claimed that Russians “rarely drink wine.”
Such dimples are not a permanent trait, for they vanish when the excessive fat goes away.

After the 1960s, and especially since the 1980s, the high school prom in many areas has become a serious exercise in excessive consumption, with boys renting expensive tuxedos and girls wearing designer gowns.
Not all dimples are formed by a genetic defect, though; some may appear due to the 36 of excessive fat on the face.

definition.zh_def: 過度的，超過正常或合理範圍的。
definition.en_def: More than is necessary, normal, or desirable; immoderate.
definition.example: His excessive spending led to financial problems.
